body_html: @zimenglan-sysu-512 The main issue was with the limitations of multiprocessing : when using spawn or forkserver (which is needed for CPU-GPU communication) sharing objects between process is rather limited and not suitable for the kind of objects I have to manipulate.
body_text: @zimenglan-sysu-512 The main issue was with the limitations of multiprocessing : when using spawn or forkserver (which is needed for CPU-GPU communication) sharing objects between process is rather limited and not suitable for the kind of objects I have to manipulate.
body: @zimenglan-sysu-512 The main issue was with the limitations of multiprocessing : when using `spawn` or `forkserver` (which is needed for CPU-GPU communication) sharing objects between process is rather limited and not suitable for the kind of objects I have to manipulate.
